channel.title: CVE Feed for Cellopoint -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cellopoint -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6744|2024-07-15T06:34:38.461Z -- cellopoint -- secure%20email%20gateway
item.description: The SMTP Listener of Secure Email Gateway from Cellopoint does not properly validate user input, leading to a Buffer Overflow vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the remote server.
